overview: Recorded during Nightwish's "Decades World Tour" on September 30th., 2018 at the Microestadio Malvinas Argentinas venue in Argentina.  Track List:  1. Swanheart / 2. End of All Hope / 3. title: Nightwish: Decades (Live in Buenos Aires)
